麳字的基本解释

麳
lái
小麦。

麳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lái］
［《廣韻》落哀切，平咍，來。］
小麦。

麳字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【麥字部】　麳； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1513第43
【廣韻】落哀切【集韻】郞才切，?音來。【廣雅】麳，小麥。麰，大麥也。本作來。【詩·周頌】貽我來牟。　又【集韻】六直切，音力。義同。　又陵之切，音釐。麥也。或从禾。齊謂麥曰䅘。　一作?。

麳字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
麳字的起名意思

暂无。

麳
Basic explanation of words
麳
lái
wheat.
麳
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lái］
["Guangyun" fell mourning and cut, flat 咍, come. ]
wheat.
麳
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Mai Zi Department] 　麳; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1513 Page 43
[Guang Yun] Lao Ai and cut [Ji Yun] Yan Cai cut, and the sound comes. [Guang Ya] Mo, wheat. Barley and barley. Originally made. [Poetry·Song of Zhou] Bring me to Mou.　[Jiyun] Six straight cuts, sound power. The same meaning.　The cut of the mausoleum, the sound li. Mai also. Or from He. Qi said that Mai said she.　一作?.
